requirements_en.minimum:
• OS: Windows XP with SP2, or Windows Vista with SP1
  • Processor: Athlon 64 3200+ or Intel Pentium 4 - 3,2 GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM (2 GB RAM for Vista)
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible 256 MB graphics card
  • DirectXÂ®: DirectX 9.0c (November 2008)
  • Hard Drive: 4.2 GB free hard drive space
  • Sound: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
Supported Graphics Cards:
  • AGP 8x or PCI Express
  • ATI Radeon X800 or better
  • nVidia GeForce 6600 GT or better
  • Video card must support ShaderModel 2.0 and hardware T&L
  • Not compatible with integrated graphics solutions, in particular laptop computers.

Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12.5: Sierra or Higher (64 Bit ONLY)
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster.
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mac must support the Metal Rendering API and be from 2014 or later. The game will not run on Macbook Air / Low End Macbooks / Mac Mini. Please note that Macs do not currently support Mods that were only packaged on Windows.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later (64 Bit ONLY)
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster.

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R9 280X series card or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game needs a dedicated graphics card to run. It will struggle to run on laptops, notebooks etc.

requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Any dual core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce 7xx Series
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
• OS: Windows XP / Vista / Windows 7 (unofficially supported)
  • Processor: Pentium +
  • Memory: 256MB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 270MB+ available HD space
  • Video: DirectX 9.0c compatible or better
  • Sound: DirectX 9.0 compatible
  • DirectX®: DirectX 9.0c or greater
